settings.content: Do you have questions or need help with the theme? Take a look at our [Shopify theme documentation](http://help.stylehatch.com/) or send us an message at [help@stylehatch.com](mailto:help@stylehatch.com). We are here to help you weekdays from 9am to 5pm Pacific Coast Time.
See a [changelog of District's updates and improvements](http://help.stylehatch.com/article/243-district-theme-changelog).
Set the primary text, accent, and background colors throughout the site. If you need some inspiration, try browsing the theme presets.
Some optional theme features like the home page - slide show and newsletter overlay include color options in those section.

settings.content: Set up a promotional bar at the top of your store to announce sales, shipping deals or general information. Customize the bar colors in the Colors menu.

settings.label: Text
settings.default: Free shipping on all orders over $100 Learn More
settings.info: Use basic HTML to format text

settings.content: Set up a popup overlay window to capture email addresses, welcome people to your store or announce sales. Enable the newsletter signup option in the Newsletter menu. Customize the bar colors in the Colors menu.

settings.label: Only enable for visitors
settings.info: Logged in customers will not see the popup.

settings.label: Enable again after delay
settings.info: After a visitor sees the popup window show it again after this delay.

settings.label: Maximum width
settings.info: For retina displays the logo image should be twice the maximum width

settings.label: Expand top bar navigation full width
Enable mobile navigation expanding dropdown menus

settings.content: Edit the footer column titles and text descriptions in the language settings (theme options > edit languages).
See documenation on [Setting up the home page slideshow](http://help.stylehatch.com/article/248-setting-up-the-homepage-hero-slider)

settings.label: Link URL
settings.info: Include https:// in the URL or use relative URLs like /collections/all

settings.label: Increase page content font size by 25%

settings.content: Add one to five grid images to link to product collections, individual products, your blog or any other URL. For best results ensure all grid images are identical in size.

settings.label: Image rollover
settings.info: Optional. 640 x 540px .jpg recommended. Match box image size.

settings.label: Number of products on each page
Number of columns to show on mobile

settings.content: For best results the primary and second product images should be the same size dimension.

settings.label: Show variant product image on rollover
Stay on current page when an item is added to the cart

settings.content: Choose a collection to show if the cart is empty. This collection will also be used for searches with no results.

settings.label: Show social media icons in footer
Newsletter list
settings.info: Choose between capture emails as Shopify customers or as a MailChimp list.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
